Name: Wild Blossom
Ingredients: 3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Aptly named - it is indeed blossom-like with subtle floral elderflower, yet also balanced with assertive gin notes.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2007 by James Scarito at BLT Market in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Wild Blossom contains 154 calories
